title: Kaseya Connect
description:
Our mission is to connect and advance the Kaseya Community through opportunities for education, networking and expert insights. Kaseya is the fastest-growing vendor in our industry, and our goal is to ensure your business accelerates and succeeds with us.

Join our global and regional events if you're looking to grow your business, connect with like-minded peers, get in-depth product training, or always be up to date about the latest in the IT industry. Join us online, or party like a rock star at one of our many live events.
